channel.title: Does This Section Need A Moderator?
channel.description:
[b]Well ive been on here for quite a while now and have had my own server for 7 months, now when I can I try and help people on here.
But there is so much crap posted in this section its unbelievable, hardly nobody has read the Section Rules or How to post a question.
So I think that this section should have its own moderator as although some mods do visit sometimes its rare and only a small proportion of the shit is actually locked.
Please Vote and have your say.
Thanks Brendan[/b]

item.title: Does This Section Need A Moderator?
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

[quote=“Scapevoy, post:3, topic:231279”][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=304607.msg2441476#msg2441476 date=1221489739]
I vote yes. I’ve spent 800 of my 1100 posts in the help section.
[/quote] Then Help me lol I’ve maded a topic ‘‘helps :o’’[/quote]

[b]Well if YOU read the Section Rules & How to post a question you would know YOU were breaking the rules anyway and it should be locked.

Brendan[/b]

Read full topic
item.source: Does This Section Need A Moderator?
